title: Lost Cause
lyrics:
Paroles de la chanson Lost Cause par KennyHoopla
Hi

Be my baby, be my girl
Have my baby, have my girl
Running crazy, run your ???
Yeah yeah yeah

There's a bounty on my neck
If they catch me they get a check
Never give them no respect
Cause all ??? have told me

You're just a lost cause
She said "I know people like you where dumb"
And if I die young
I was born with tie on my head

Yeah yeah yeah
With a tie on my head
Yeah yeah yeah

Round time pulling on the right skirt
Dreaming about some diamonds reflecting a black car trigger finger
Rest stop brought in as a restart
Hard to take controlling you drive in emotions
Paranoia killing me
